001package net.tvburger.jdl.cnn.pooling;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.cnn.PoolingFunction;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.Array;
005
006public class MinimumPooling implements PoolingFunction {
007
008    @Override
009    public Float pool(Array<Float> elements) {
010        Float min = null;
011        for (int i = 1; i < elements.length(); i++) {
012            if (min == null || min > elements.get(i)) {
013                min = elements.get(i);
014            }
015        }
016        return min;
017    }
018}
